page.title: 04FOCUS CENTRE
page.content: BUILT IN THE FIRST INSTANCE AS A YOUTH CENTRE FROM MONEY RAISED BY THE LOCAL ROTARY CLUB,THE CENTRE IS NOW FOR COMMUNITY USE AND STAFFED AND MAINTAINED BY BORDERS REGIONAL COUNCIL. A COMMUNITY WORKER WITH THE AID OF A COMMUNITY ASSISTANT MANAGES THE CENTRE WHICH OFFERS FACILITIES FOR CLUBS,LEARNING EXCHANGE GROUPS,BAND PRACTICES, RECREATION CLASSES,ETC. IT IS USED MOST DAYS AND EVENINGS. ALL THE EQUIPMENT IS FUNDED FROM CLUB FUNDS AND EACH USER GROUP CAN BE REPRESENTED ON THE HOUSE COMMITTEE WHICH CAN ADVISE THE REGIONAL COUNCIL.
